thread.title: Our Favorite Sneakers Worn at Paris Fashion Week FW17
thread.title_full: Our Favorite Sneakers Worn at Paris Fashion Week FW17

author: Chris Danforth
title: Our Favorite Sneakers Worn at Paris Fashion Week FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 15 images from this gallery. 
Location: Paris, France

Season: FW17
Key Looks: The Solomon hiking joints paired with oversize denim (slide #4) certainly stand out, as well as the brave individual that attempted to pull of UNDERCOVER and Nike’s Jungle Dunk (slide #1). We’re also feeling Vans’ recent collaboration with Supreme on a leopard-print Sk8-Mid Pro (slide #14) and the red Nike Shox (slide #15).
Editor’s Notes: Raf Simons’ footwear range with adidas Originals remains the top choice for fashionistas on the street style circuit.

For more FW17 coverage inspo, check out what Paris fashionistas wore to Off-White’s latest womenswear show .
